div.div: Saint John's Univ. vs. Univ. of St. Thomas

tr.td: St. Johns won the toss. Johnnies elect to receive.
Tim Albright kickoff 63 yards to the SJU7, Dylan Graves return 8 yards to the SJU15 (Tyler Erstad;Dan Noehring).
John Ries pass incomplete to Taylor Freetly.
John Ries pass complete to Nick Schneider for 2 yards to the SJU17 (Harry Pitera;Chinni Oji).
